00027 #include <geometry/ICurveAbstract.h>
00028 #include <geometry/IDirectPosition.h>
00029 #include <common/Collection.h>
00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The GisILineString class is a LineString Geometry type.  
00032 /// The shape of GisILineString is the set of positions defined by the contained collection, 
00033 /// plus linear interpolation between consecutive points.
00034 class GisILineString : public GisICurveAbstract
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038     /// \brief
00039     /// Gets the number of positions in this object.
00040     /// 
00041     /// \return
00042     /// Returns the number of positions
00043     /// 
00044     GISGEOM_API virtual GisInt32 GetCount() const = 0;
00045 
00046     /// \brief
00047     /// Gets the position at the specified (zero-based) index.
00048     /// 
00049     /// \param index 
00050     /// Input Zero-based index in the object's list of positions.
00051     /// 
00052     /// \return
00053     /// Returns the position
00054     /// 
00055     GISGEOM_API virtual GisIDirectPosition* GetItem(
00056         GisInt32 index) const = 0;
00057 
00058     /// \brief
00059     /// Gets the position at the specified (zero-based) index, by values of its member data.
00060     /// This is in aid of higher performance for any implementation that
00061     /// does not internally use GisIDirectPosition objects for storage, or for
00062     /// an application seeking to avoid overhead of accessor methods.
00063     /// 
00064     /// \param index 
00065     /// Input Zero-based index in the object's list of positions.
00066     /// \param x 
00067     /// Output X ordinate value.
00068     /// \param y 
00069     /// Output Y ordinate value.
00070     /// \param z 
00071     /// Output Z ordinate value.
00072     /// \param m 
00073     /// Output M ordinate value.
00074     /// \param dimensionality 
00075     /// Output Dimensionality of ordinates in this position.
00076     /// 
00077     /// \return
00078     /// Returns nothing
00079     /// 
00080     GISGEOM_API virtual void GetItemByMembers(
00081         GisInt32 index,
00082         double *x,
00083         double *y,
00084         double *z,
00085         double *m,
00086         GisInt32 *dimensionality) const = 0;
00087 
00088     /// \brief
00089     /// Gets a collection of all of the positions in this object.
00090     /// 
00091     /// \return
00092     /// Returns the positions
00093     /// 
00094     GISGEOM_API virtual GisDirectPositionCollection* GetPositions() = 0;
00095 
00096     /// \brief
00097     /// Gets the ordinates as an array.
00098     /// 
00099     /// \remarks
00100     /// The caller must not free the returned array.
00101     /// The ordinates are in the order XYZMXYZM..., with only those present 
00102     /// according to the dimensionality.
00103     /// 
00104     /// \return
00105     /// Returns the ordinates
00106     /// 
00107     GISGEOM_API virtual const double * GetOrdinates() = 0;
00108 
00109 protected:
00110 
00111     /// \brief
00112     /// Constructs a default instance.
00113     /// 
00114     /// \return
00115     /// Returns nothing
00116     /// 
00117     GISGEOM_API GisILineString() {};
00118 
00119     /// \brief
00120     /// Default destructor.
00121     /// 
00122     /// \return
00123     /// Returns nothing
00124     /// 
00125     GISGEOM_API virtual ~GisILineString() {};
00126 };
00127 
00128 
00129 /// \brief
00130 ///  The GisLineStringCollection class is a collection of CurvePolygon objects.
00131 class GisLineStringCollection : public GisCollection<GisILineString, GisException>
00132 {
00133 public:
00134     /// \brief
00135     ///  Creates an instance of GisLineStringCollection with no contained elements.
00136     /// 
00137     /// \return
00138     /// Returns an empty collection
00139     /// 
00140     static GisLineStringCollection* Create()
00141     {
00142         GisLineStringCollection* value = new GisLineStringCollection();
00143         if (NULL == value)
00144             throw GisException::Create(GisException::NLSGetMessage(GIS_NLSID(GIS_1_BADALLOC)));
00145 
00146         return value;
00147     }
00148 
00149 protected:
00150     void Dispose()
00151     {
00152         delete this;
00153     }
00154 };
